actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to cause the vessel Miss Keku, owned by Clarence Jackson of Juneau, Alaska, to be documented as a vessel of the United States with coast-wise privileges.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to cause the vessel Miss Keku, owned by Clarence Jackson of Juneau, Alaska, to be documented as a vessel of the United States with coast-wise privileges.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to cause the vessel Miss Keku, owned by Clarence Jackson of Juneau, Alaska, to be documented as a vessel of the United States with coast-wise privileges.
